1.0.name: wordpress/ilike-social-media-optimization
1.0.description: With iLike Social Media Optimization (SMO) for Wordpress, you can turn on and customize many social network profile buttons which power by AddThis.com but with slight enhanced iLikeiPlus feature (which can be enabled and disabled as well) to let your earn more traffic for your social profile. The standard buttons will show Facebook, Google+, Pinterest, and Twitter button.
